name: Cloudy Drone
description:
Enable Full Screen Mode For Better Expierience 

the art might look weird but its my first time ever creating 2d Art (i Draw pixel art but not that good)

-=-=-

Game Info

-=-=-

You Play As A Drone Which Uses Energy while Moving 

You'r Task Is To Avoid losing You'r Energy by Refilling it From The Dark Clouds

Try To Beat You'r HighScore

Enjoy

-=-=-

Theme :  You'r Weakness Is You'r Strength

Time : 3 Hours
